body_html:
You need to send the outputs of net1 to a different device. PyTorch won’t do that for you. Change self.net1(x) to self.net1(x).cuda(device_of_net2).

Also in the future use forums for questions. We only use GitHub issues for bug tracking
body_text:
You need to send the outputs of net1 to a different device. PyTorch won’t do that for you. Change self.net1(x) to self.net1(x).cuda(device_of_net2).
Also in the future use forums for questions. We only use GitHub issues for bug tracking
body:
You need to send the outputs of net1 to a different device. PyTorch won’t do that for you. Change `self.net1(x)` to `self.net1(x).cuda(device_of_net2)`.

Also in the future use forums for questions. We only use GitHub issues for bug tracking
